base_template.name: Bootstrap Base
base_template.html:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <style>
            {{css}}
        </style>
        <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-EVSTQN3/azprG1Anm3QDgpJLIm9Nao0Yz1ztcQTwFspd3yD65VohhpuuCOmLASjC" crossorigin="anonymous">
    </head>
    <body>
        {% block content %}{% endblock %}
    </body>
</html>

template.name: All Fields - Audit Log
template.template_md:
{% block content %}

Audit Log

{% for item in data_sources.allFieldsAuditLog %} {% endfor %}
id username agent agent_id entry_time action object_type before_value after_value message debug_info debug_info.ip
{{ item.id }} {{ item.username }} {{ item.agent }} {{ item.agent_id }} {{ item.entry_time }} {{ item.action }} {{ item.object_type }} {{ item.before_value }} {{ item.after_value }} {{ item.message }} {{ item.debug_info }} {{ item.debug_info.ip }}
{% endblock %}
